short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Choose to make your Twitter auto submit follow,like,retweet you do need.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Twitter Elements Auto Submit
NON-OFFICIAL TWITTER TOOL TO:

 - auto follow users
 - auto like and retweet tweets
 - auto close table page


HOW TO

Steps for following user:

1. Visit twitter.com
2. turn on the plugin button to "Follow"
3. Browse any page with profiles or intent api with user(twitter.com/intent/user?screen_name=ceshi)ï¼Œ it will auto click the follow button.


Steps for liking and retweet tweets:

1. Visit twitter.com
2. turn on the plugin button to "Like and RT"
3. Browse any page with public tweets or intent api with like/retweet(twitter.com/intent/like?tweet_id=1634122), it will auto click like and retweet button.


turn on the plugin button to "Close Tab", It will close the page after automatically following, liking, and retweeting."
